name: GANGSTER HELL: Ay, get outta here!
name_original: GANGSTER HELL: Ay, get outta here!
description:
Play as a gangster haunted by all those whom he clipped. Your days of eating gabagool, and romancing your goomar are over. Get all these gangster out of your head - escape GANGSTER HELL!

p.s. you can't escape... if you survive over 4 mins you've basically experienced it all

enemies and your weapon strength improve over time
